artist: Manufacturer: Royal Doulton Potteries; Decorator: F. Hancock
description: brown toned ground; decoration of blue flower bud and three yellow-brown flowers with blue centers; gilt highlights; gilded scalloped edge
life_date: Burslem, Staffordshire, and Stoke-on-Trent, English, est. 1815
markings: on bottom: \'Daulton\'s\' impressed; \'Daulton Burslem\', in brown; \'Davis Collamore/New York\', in green; on front: \'F. Hancock\', in brown, near edge
title: Dinner plate
